actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Budget.

official_title: Providing a sense of the Congress that the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 1996 should reach a balanced Federal budget by fiscal year 2001 through expenditure reductions and not tax increases.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the concurrent resolution on the budget for FY 1996 should reach a balanced Federal budget by FY 2001 through expenditure reductions without tax increases.

titles.title: Providing a sense of the Congress that the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 1996 should reach a balanced Federal budget by fiscal year 2001 through expenditure reductions and not tax increases.
